alert.note: Alert for Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 18 at 1:28PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is ongoing. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following county, Noble. * WHEN...Until 730 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 128 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dudley and Dexter City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
